Additional Scope Comments: All agency email in all agency email accounts will be managed using GRS 6.1 items 010 and 011.  The Agency will not be using item 012.
Legacy Email Scope: The capstone approach will be applied to all legacy email starting in 2011 when USDA and its components implemented ProofPoiint. Prior to 2011, USDA applied a print and file policy to emails. Extant legacy email prior to 2011 is inaccessible and will be scheduled for disposal on a separate Request for Records Disposition Authority.
